label: ConformanceCertificate
comment: The label delivered by a trusted third party to assess the compliance of a product or a service with an agreed standard.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of specified certificate.
An identifier of a party issuing this sustainability assertion.
The software operating system, expressed as text, for which this conformance certificate is produced.

referencedBy.comment: A conformance certificate obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
